## fieldRegistry.register() function

Registers a field type. fieldRegistry.fromJson uses this registry to find the appropriate field type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function register(type: string, fieldClass: FieldProto): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string | The field type name as used in the JSON definition. |
|  fieldClass | FieldProto | The field class containing a fromJson function that can construct an instance of the field. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} if the type name is empty, the field is already registered, or the fieldClass is not an object containing a fromJson function.
